channel.title: Allstarscape 317 |Torva|Virtus|Nice eco|VPS|Looking for players/staff|MUST SEE|
channel.description:
[CENTER] [SIZE=6][B]Welcome to allstarscape official advertisement tread[/B][/SIZE]
Allstarscape is an quite new RSPS, We done alot of programming work and made an nice server. Allstarscape is VPS hosted and 24/7 online, were doing an great job and somethimes there are around 20 people online (when writing this). Were growing hard and have an nice communitty, we got IPB forums wich are looking great, we got 100+ youtube videos for getting alot new players. Well enough says. Look at the screenshots and videos.

item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“Cruel Truth, post:5, topic:511070”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=629316.msg4270341#msg4270341 date=1364484716]

^ sort of agree with this.

The server name is allstar but I see PI ~^

Nobody names a server after their base. I’d like to see you host a server and call it “project insanity”
[/quote]You do realize…that sanity had a server called that?

or at least I think he did could be wrong. :rolleyes:

At any rate he shouldn’t be giving allstar a bad name with this pi junk.[/quote]

You do know there both crap?
